name: Moon 2
desc: Add .carousel-fade to your carousel to animate slides with a fade transition instead of a slide. Depending on your carousel content (e.g., text only slides), you may want to add .bg-body or some custom CSS to the .carousel-items for proper crossfading.Add .carousel-fade to your carousel to animate slides with a fade transition instead of a slide.
